alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 3:18PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and a mix of rain, freezing rain, and sleet possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 8 inches and ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will likely lead to blowing and drifting snow Wednesday night into Thursday. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and southeast Illinois. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Shelby
